Hero.subtitle: A week full of workshops dedicated to West African music and dance
Hero.subtitle2: delicious food and lots of activities in the idyllic nature.

djembe.title: Djembe
djembe.description: 9 hours of training. From Intermediate to Masterclass, taught by amazing Djembefolas.

dance.title: Dance
dance.description: 12 hours of training. Open level. West African dance and beyond!

balafon.title: Balafon
balafon.description: 6 hours of training. Two levels: beginners and intermediate/advanced.

Accommodation.title: ACCOMMODATION

items.title: Bungalows
items.description: The bungalows have 1 family room, a bathroom and an equipped kitchen.
items.subtitle: Sold Out

items.title: Camping
items.description: Ample space with trees to set up tents and an area reserved for vans.
items.subtitle: Free Pass

Accommodation.foodDesc: Our kitchen prepares three meals a day, with a vegetarian option always available.

items.text: My debut couldn't have been better! It was wonderful...
items.author: Michele C.

items.text: Wonderful organization and teachers, delicious food, great family of friends...
items.author: Susi A.

items.text: Obrigado, gracias, merci, inuwali, anitche!!! ADC family you guys are awesome!
items.author: Miguel R.

Location.title: HOW TO GET THERE
Location.park: Parque de Campismo de Aldeia Ruiva
Location.car: By car via IC8 (exit at Isna de S. Carlos)
Location.bus: By bus with Rede Expressos to Sertã
Location.taxi: By taxi: Sertã - Aldeia Ruiva (10 minutes)

CTA.title: QUESTIONS?
CTA.desc: We have answers. Information about prices can be found on the registration form.
